long_description: Warm-weather fun wouldn't be complete without the perfect pair of shorts. The KAVU Phoebe Shorts feature classic cotton twill, but added spandex lets you stretch your limits. Cotton with a hint of spandex is lightweight, breathable and can keep up with your every move. Front slash pockets and back welt pockets. KAVU Phoebe Shorts have an 11 in. inseam.
short_description: Warm-weather fun wouldn't be complete without the perfect pair of shorts. The KAVU Phoebe Shorts feature classic cotton twill, but added spandex lets you stretch your limits.
